name: Tetris Crush Saga
description:
A free and open source Unity game developed for One Game A Month Challenge (http://www.onegameamonth.com/), January-2016 edition.

It was developed in four weeks. You can get all the sources from here: https://github.com/SergioCaronte/1gam_january

Any bug please leave a comment. Thank you.

Enjoy it!
